page.title: 12 Cotmaton area of sidmouth.
page.content: The Cotmaton area of Sidmouth is a very select residential area consisting of mostly detached houses with well cared for gardens in the Â£80,000 to Â£100,000 price bracket.Most of the residents are now retired and formerly held professional and managerial positions.There is at least one millionaire amongst them. From this area there are beautiful views of the surrounding hills and the sea. The amenities of the golf course are close at hand as are three large hotels with private swimming clubs. The residents enjoy a quiet,peaceful existence in beautiful surroundings whilst at the same time enjoying a lively social life.
